extendedInfo.description: Machhapuchchhre Mobile Money application facilitates our customer to perform convenient, secured and anytime banking to manage their finances from their Android phone.The application is applicable to all the customers having their Machhapuchchhre Bank accounts with Machhapuchchhre Mobile Money Subscriptions.Machhapuchchhre Mobile Money Features::Balance EnquiryMini StatementInformation regarding banking hourCheque book requestStatement RequestForeign exchange rateFund transferNTC Landline bill paymentNTC GSM Postpaid bill paymentNTC ADSL bill paymentNTC GSM prepaid mobile recharge pin requestNTC CDMA prepaid mobile recharge pin request NCell Postpaid (PRO) bill paymentLoad eSewa balanceVaroius merchant paymentSecurity::Your Personal and Financial information will be protected while using this application.

reviews.title: Text didn\'t displayed
reviews.comment: On my phone this app. Wont display the text plz fix it.
reviews.author: Raj Giri
